localization.ParticleFilter¶

class localization.ParticleFilter(n_particles=100, resampling_type='Random', state_estimation_method='WeightedAverage', resampling_threshold=0)¶

Bases: object

This is a base class particle filter that contains many of the re-usable elements common across implementaitons of particle fitlers.

__init__(n_particles=100, resampling_type='Random', state_estimation_method='WeightedAverage', resampling_threshold=0)¶
